description: A yum cha staple, these egg tarts feature a silky smooth custard encased in buttery shortcrust.
name: Hong Kong Egg Custard Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 minutes. After 8-10 minutes, once the crusts start to brown, lower the temp to 160C. Start checking them at 20 minutes by sticking a toothpick into the egg - if it stands by itself, the custard is set. Don't overbake. We want silky custard.
